body:
Rather than showing and hiding this `View` manually `ListVIew` actually has a super handy `setEmptyView()` method that allows us to specify a `View` to be shown when the `LIstView` is empty.  The `ListView` then handles all the showing and hiding for us.

Check out [this guide here](https://cyrilmottier.com/2011/06/20/listview-tips-tricks-1-handle-emptiness/) if you're not sure how to do this :smile:

This network check will throw a null pointer error if the device is in airplane mode.  Please check out [the docs](https://developer.android.com/training/monitoring-device-state/connectivity-monitoring.html) to see how to perform a network check properly, there's a critical line missing here that handles the airplane mode situation :smile:
